glosses: neighbour (a person living on adjacent or nearby land)

examples.text: Küçük bir çocukken çok sevdiğim komşularım vardı.
examples.translation: When I was a little child, I had neighbours whom I loved so much.

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish قونشو (konşu, komşu), from Proto-Turkic *kon- (“neighbour; friend; guest”). Cognate with Gagauz komuşu, Azerbaijani qonşu.
